annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) gets booked for the first time in this match.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal 2:3! Jordi Alba laid the ball off to Lionel Messi (Barcelona), who shot from close range into the left side of the goal, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 min. of stoppage time to be played.

Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) takes a good first touch from a cross and fires a powerful shot from the edge of the box towards the left post. The goalkeeper, though, is ready and denies him with a brilliant save.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Marcelo sends a precise lofted cross into the box. James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) latches on to it and finishes with a quick shot into the top left corner. The goalkeeper had no chance. The score changes to 2:2.

Great solo effort by Lionel Messi (Barcelona) as he beats two defenders before firing in a drive from just outside of the box towards the bottom right corner. The goalkeeper is ready and makes an amazing save.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Karim Benzema departs the field of play to be replaced by James Rodriguez (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alejandro Hernandez shows a yellow card to Mateo Kovacic (Real Madrid) for his blatant foul.
Gerard Pique (Barcelona) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a low drive towards the middle of the net, but Keylor Navas is alert and denies him.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 81044.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) sends a pass into the box, but his attempt is thwarted and cleared. Barcelona win a corner.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) kept talking out of turn to the referee until Alejandro Hernandez lost patience and pulled out a yellow card.

annotations.label: r-card
annotations.description: Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) makes a horrific tackle on his opponent and is shown a straight red card by the referee!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner which is cleared.
Mateo Kovacic (Real Madrid) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The ball goes out for a corner. Real Madrid can continue in their attacking effort.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot inside the left post. His attempt was beyond the reach of Keylor Navas, so the score changes to 1:2.

Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) picks up the ball, dribbles to the edge of the penalty area and unleashes a brilliant shot to the bottom right corner, but is thwarted by a great save from Marc Andre ter Stegen.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Zinedine Zidane has decided to make a change. Mateo Kovacic (Real Madrid) replaces Casemiro.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here's the change. Alcacer Paco leaves the pitch and Andre Gomes (Barcelona) comes on as a substitute.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) is cleared by the opposition's defence.

Luis Suarez (Barcelona) gets on the end of a pass and produces a promising first time shot towards the right side of the goal. His effort is blocked by Keylor Navas with a brilliant diving save! Barcelona have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

Marc Andre ter Stegen doesn't have to worry about this one. Marco Asensio plays a pass into the feet of Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), who is unable to find the target as his effort from inside the box goes high over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner and sends it into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and makes a good clearance.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) whips the ball in, but it fails to reach any of his teammates as the opposition's defence averts the threat. Real Madrid will take a corner kick.
Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) finds himself behind the opposition's defence, but the game is stopped for offside.
Keylor Navas pulls off a fantastic reflex save to stop an accurate header from the corner kick by Gerard Pique (Barcelona) going inside the right hand post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) will try to find the head of one of his teammates from a corner kick.
Andres Iniesta (Barcelona) tries to send a pass but it's blocked. The ball goes out of play. Barcelona are awarded a corner kick.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) takes the free kick from mid range, but he balloons his effort high over the bar. What a miskick!
Casemiro (Real Madrid) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Alejandro Hernandez blows his whistle for a foul. Barcelona are awarded a free kick.
Alcacer Paco (Barcelona) receives a precise low pass inside the box, controls the ball and drills it to the middle of the goal, but Keylor Navas makes a comfortable save to stop his effort.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted.

A brilliant cross into the box finds Karim Benzema (Real Madrid), who directs his header to the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper shows his reflexes and makes an astonishing save. The ball is out of play. Real Madrid win a corner kick.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) makes a run beyond the last defender, but he's offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Corner kick. Real Madrid will have an opportunity. Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.

Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) produces a ferocious strike from the edge of the box. His dangerous effort towards the left post is blocked by Marc Andre ter Stegen, who pulls off a superb save to keep the ball out of the net. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Real Madrid.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) fails to find any of his teammates inside the box as his pass is blocked. Good work from Real Madrid as they win a corner.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to signal the start of the second half.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Alejandro Hernandez has ended it.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) receives a fine cross inside the box and attempts to score a goal, but his shot flies just wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) will deliver the ball into the penalty box from a corner kick.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) tries to send a low pass into the box, but it's blocked and cleared. Barcelona have been awarded a corner kick.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) decides to speed play up by quickly sending the free kick into the box.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) commits a rough challenge and Alejandro Hernandez blows his whistle for an infringement. Barcelona will take a free kick.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 2 min. of added time.
Great ball in from Luis Suarez. Jordi Alba (Barcelona) should really have done better with a close range header, but he heads it a whisker wide of the left post.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: The current number of shots on goal is 14:9.
Great teamplay by Barcelona as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Problems for Zinedine Zidane as Gareth Bale is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) replaces him.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona) was quite harsh and Alejandro Hernandez didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Looks like Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) is struggling after picking up a knock. Hopefully he can run it off.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) receives a pass and tries his luck with a shot from 24 metres out. Marc Andre ter Stegen pulls off a decent save to stop the effort going into the right side of the goal.
Andres Iniesta (Barcelona) fails to find a teammate across the pitch with a long ball.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Ivan Rakitic displays great vision and sends a pass to Lionel Messi (Barcelona), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the bottom right corner. The score is 1:1.
Barcelona try to maintain the tempo of the game by taking a quick free kick.
Alejandro Hernandez blows his whistle after Casemiro (Real Madrid) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. Barcelona get a free kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Casemiro (Real Madrid) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low inside the left post. It's 1:0.
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) gathers a cross inside the box and strikes the ball. He wastes a great scoring opportunity as his shot only hits the right hand post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.
Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender. Real Madrid get a corner.
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) sends a beautiful cross into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence manages to clear the ball to safety.
Marcelo races towards the box before laying off to Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), who picks it up but blazes a shot well over the bar from the edge of the box.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.

Gareth Bale (Real Madrid)'s poor effort is easily saved by Marc Andre ter Stegen. He connects well with a cross, but mistimes it a little, and it heads low towards the middle of the target and straight into the grateful hands of the goalkeeper.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is having a really tough time right now. We are about to find out how serious his injury is.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he unleashed a powerful low shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the middle of the goal, but Marc Andre ter Stegen made a crucial save!

Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) unleasheaKarim Benzema (Real Madrid) unleashes a beautiful mid range volley low to the middle of the goal, but his effort is thwarted by the keeper, and the score remains the same.s a beautiful mid range volley low to the middle of the goal, but his effort is thwarted by the keeper, and the score doesn't change.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) makes his forward run a little too early and is caught in an offside position after his teammate tries to play a pass to him.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) attempts to send a low pass into the box from the edge of the penalty area, but the opposition's defence knocks the ball to safety.
Flag up against Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Casemiro (Real Madrid) has tested the patience of referee Alejandro Hernandez and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Luis Suarez (Barcelona) knew what to do with the ball, but was just a bit unlucky. After receiving a pass, he sent the ball goalwards from some 20 metres out, but it missed the left post by a whisker.
Andres Iniesta (Barcelona) gets on the end of a good pass and from mid range he unleashes a decent strike, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
The linesman raises his flag. Luis Suarez (Barcelona) is adjudged offside.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) aims a low effort to the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper makes a comfortable save.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) attempts to find one of his teammates inside the box with a chip pass, but one of the defending players reacts superbly and intercepts the ball.
A long pass, executed by Toni Kroos (Real Madrid), missed the precision to reach his teammates.
